summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details various charges, discounts, and shipment summaries for multiple packages sent by Epstein, including the dates of pickup and delivery, as well as the recipients of the shipments.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 31, 2004, and details shipping charges totaling $196.90.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.
Multiple shipments were sent by Epstein to various recipients, including Tom Pritzker and Derek Gossett.
The invoice includes details of discounts applied to the shipping charges.
Several packages were picked up and delivered on specific dates in May 2004.
